channel.title: /content/PAK mods - New SML doesnt open
channel.description:
Im interested in modding and im reading the documentations, but when i try to run a pak the game says there is one mod loaded, but it doesn't show in the game
I downloaded the last version of the SML (19march) and the last version of pak file of the Flags mod 0.3.2.
![image|690x143](upload://8QGfvVDYAzzD8OQqqfXUgvaV7hy.png)
![image|298x208](upload://vjBJkxMUq5QbAFRcpTrJSCerrCn.jpeg)
![image|228x244](upload://ttoZlAmjYTtSaw70x3FknSaxsmO.png)
![image|391x277](upload://nFNykcJA9qhLE7B0XNd5e9PIKGr.jpeg)
I can t understand what im doing wrong.

item.title: /content/PAK mods - New SML doesnt open
item.dc:creator: @Andre_Aquila DellAquila
item.description:
@Andre_Aquila wrote:

Nice… Thank you very much!! I will follow up the news, and try this way.

Congrats for the great work you guys are doing

Read full topic

item.title: /content/PAK mods - New SML doesnt open
item.dc:creator: @Robb Rob B
item.description:
@Robb wrote:

We are currently rewriting the docs for the new SML 2.0 systems. A few key things with pak mod loading have changed. We are currently rewriting the docs for the new SML 2.0 systems. A few key things with pak mod loading have changed. We’ll announce on the discord when the new docs are out. For now, you can try marking ‘For Mod Developers > Toggle SML Always Installed’ in the launcher to make sure that SML is always loaded when you’re testing your mods. This may or may not fix your issue depending on how your Unreal project is set up.

Read full topic

item.title: /content/PAK mods - New SML doesnt open
item.dc:creator: @Andre_Aquila DellAquila
item.description:
@Andre_Aquila wrote:

Through the download by the SML application works correctly.

But since I’m trying to create PAK files, I was wondering if they are working properly. So I took this file from the portal and put it in the directory of the paks. But as it is not running, I think maybe that’s why it is not running the ones I am creating as well. Im doing the doc tutorial but doesnt seems to be loading the files. (appear as mod loaded in menu screen but dont shows in-game)

Read full topic
